curam.util.client.domain.convert
Class CuramTimeConverter

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.common.plugin.AbstractPlugIn

          curam.util.client.domain.AbstractClientDomainPlugIn
              curam.util.client.domain.convert.AbstractConverter
                  curam.util.client.domain.convert.DateTimeConverter
                      curam.util.client.domain.convert.SvrDateTimeConverter
                          curam.util.client.domain.convert.CuramTimeConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
curam.util.client.domain.convert.ClientDomainConverter, DomainConverter, DomainPlugIn, PlugIn
public class CuramTimeConverter
extends SvrDateTimeConverter

A converter for the CURAM_TIME domain, a core derivative of the SVR_DATETIME domain. The values are stored with any date part supplied, but the date part is ignored when formatting, validating ranges (by the action of the associated comparator plug-in), etc. The format of the time is defined by the application's time format configuration. The generic format complies with the ISO 8601 standard time format "THHmmss". The system "zero" time is formatted as an empty string.
